faq.q: How does the lottery system ensure fairness?
faq.a: Our algorithm tracks member booking history and uses fairness scoring to ensure equitable access to prime tee times over time. The system is fully customizable to match your course's specific member priority rules and preferences.

faq.q: Can members book tee times on mobile?
faq.a: Yes, the mobile PWA allows members to book tee times, invite guests, and manage their reservations from any device.
Our system monitors tee time intervals and provides real-time pace alerts to staff, with automated notifications to help maintain optimal course flow throughout the day.

faq.q: Can we customize it for our course branding?
faq.a: Absolutely. Each course gets independent branding, custom color schemes, logo integration, and course-specific messaging.
